anya-e0105n32:1: Kaṅkhāvitaraṇiṁ nāma pātimokkhaṭṭhakathaṁ ācariyabuddhaghosatthero soṇattherena yācito mahāvihāravāsīnaṁ vācanāmagganissitaṁ sīhaḷapātimokkhaṭṭhakathānayaṁ nissāya ekampi padaṁ pāḷiyā vā mahāvihāravāsīnaṁ porāṇaṭṭhakathāhi vā avirodhetvā akāsi. Tena vuttaṁ tissaṁ aṭṭhakathāyaṁ –
anya-e0105n32:7: Vattayissāmi nāmena, kaṅkhāvitaraṇiṁ subha’’nti kaṅkhā aṭṭha. ganthārambhakathā ca.
anya-e0105n32:10: Nissāya sā ayaṁ niṭṭhaṁ, gatā ādāya sabbaso;
anya-e0105n32:12: Na hettha taṁ padaṁ atthi, yaṁ virujjheyya pāḷiyā;
anya-e0105n32:13: Mahāvihāravāsīnaṁ, porāṇaṭṭhakathāhi vā’’ti kaṅkhā. aṭṭha. nigamanakathā ca.
